locations: 810 Seventh Ave. Suite 620 New York, NY 10019
keyFacts: The Southern District of Florida recused itself from Epstein matters around March 2019, after which the Northern District of Georgia became involved in the CVRA case.
Prosecutors obtained a warrant to search electronic devices seized from Epstein and his residence, prompting defense concerns about protecting attorney-client privileged communications.
Defense attorneys requested a 'taint team' protocol to screen seized materials for privilege and sought preservation of internal DOJ communications relevant to the investigation's origins.
The SDNY investigation was active for several months prior to the SDFL recusal, and prosecutors stated the investigation was initiated internally.
